column5: Hi, I see there are some dog lovers on the board. Loved the "look-a-like" pics of Lew's dog Marvin. Here's a few pics of "Lilly" the little dog we got for our daughter Caroline this past June. She was pretty small for her first bath but looks pretty comical soaking wet.     Lilly's hair just kept on growing until she looked like a dust mop.   Finally after a visit to the barber...
Very cute ChrisS...But if I can figure out how to post pics my McKenzie will beat the crap out of your Lilly LOL!!!!!

Here's a few of our girls.  They go with us on all our fishing trips and just love it.  They are both very good in the boat as well .... until someone gets a fish on, then everyone is hanging over the side of the boat.  The Airedale is 6 years old and the Lab is 1 year old.
Rich..make sure you click on the image in the gallery so it gets full size before you get the properties...otherwise you get the thumbnail properties and URL.
Thanks Rick ... I knew something didn't look quite.  You can delete my reply here so as to not change the direction ChrisS post.
Heres a one of my pup  And here's one of him working a bird
That is one BEAUTIFUL DOG.
So here's Amy in action on our September vacation with the trailer   And earlier in June at lakair in the truck camper   Busy...Busy...Busy but she does fish!
Here is my doggie.
Might as well also  Here's my dog Scoobie
All very cute.  I've seen verno's dog elsewhere. Dog's and camping just go together.  Pam
Dogs and anything go together
HELLO EVERYONE   HERE IS MY BABY     SHE IS A 18 Month old Black Lab named KIRA,   Amazing dog with the family and me..      DAVE

Here's our mutt....he's a Pekingese/Shih-tzu mix. My wife always wanted a Harley Davidson Motorbike, but I told her to name the dog Harley, cause it was the closest she'll ever get to owning one!!!  This first pic is him at 12 weeks....    Here he is at 9 months...    His fishing moment occurred at Lake Scugog....he was walking backwards....right off the boat landing and into the lake!!! My 4 year old laughed silly for over 20 minutes, while the poor dog shivered!!!
Here's my baby Lola. She's a 10 year old English Springer that acts 2.
Introducing my cousin's dog Mr Monty, a Jack Russell, about 12 years old now has a novel way of begging!    Mick
Here's a couple of Bear enjoying a boat ride early this year...

Here's a pic of my girl, Amber on the dock at Big Gull lake this past September. She's almost 12 now, but still has the energy of a pup when she gets around water...    Here's a pic of my girl, Amber on the dock at Big Gull lake this past September. She's almost 12 now, but still has the energy of a pup when she gets around water... Uh, what happened DebS??
Maybe debs doesn't actually have a dog...  If you need help with posting pics...shoot me a PM!
